{"label": "entailed", "major_premise": "The Grand Canal involves the Yellow River and the Yangtze River, the two core areas of ancient cultural civilization, connecting Yan culture, Qilu culture, Wu Yue culture and other important cultural areas in Chinese history. The coast of the Grand Canal is an area with concentrated population and dense cultural sites in ancient China. In all ages, the Grand Canal has left rich cultural monuments, known as the ancient cultural corridor, its cultural relic value and significance are extraordinary. Not only that, the length of the Grand Canal has also set a record of proudly around the world, especially dozens of cities along the coast have unique cultural landscape and folk customs, preserving extremely unique inland river culture. However, as the crystallization of wisdom and creativity of Chinese ancestors, the Grand Canal has not been listed as a national key cultural relic protection unit, and there is no special law to affirm and guarantee its historical status. The status quo of the protection of the Grand Canal is worrying. In addition to thousands of years of river embankment burst, sediment blockage, water shortage and other natural causes, there are also man-made factors such as random opening of branch channels, interception of water, poor customer management and so on. Because many river sections make use of natural lakes and natural rivers, many people do not realize that the Grand Canal is also a cultural heritage or cultural relic site at the age of three. {"label": "not entailed", "major_premise": "The principle of visible light communication technology is very simple, light represents 1, light off represents 0, and the combination of light and off carries information. Taking into account the development trend of technology and product practicability, visible light communication is not likely to replace wireless networks and be widely used in homes, but this does not mean that this technology has no practical value. {"label": "entailed", "major_premise": "Arthur Okun, a famous American economist, found the empirical relationship between economic growth rate and unemployment rate in cyclical fluctuations, that is, when the real GDP growth decreases by 2% relative to the potential GDP growth (generally defined as 3% in the United States), the unemployment rate increases by about 1%. This rule, named after its discoverer, is called Okun's law. This concept was first proposed by Okun. It refers to the maximum output value generated by a country's economy while maintaining relatively stable prices. However, when emphasizing the legal system, many people intentionally or unintentionally exclude the people and like to say that the rule of law is not governing the people, but governing officials. Indeed, when we talk about governing the country according to law, being in power according to law, and administering according to law, we are mainly aimed at those who exercise power, and we need to earnestly grasp the key minority of leading cadres. However, no matter running the country, being in power or administrating, all need the cooperation of citizens. Citizens not only need to be the result of relative obedience to the exercise of relevant powers, but also need to participate in managing state affairs, managing economic and cultural undertakings, and managing social affairs through various ways and forms according to legal regulations. On the one hand, it is necessary to emphasize that party members and cadres, especially leading cadres, should play an exemplary and leading role, on the other hand, we should adhere to the mass line of the rule of law and cultivate citizens' awareness of abiding by the law in a down-to-earth manner. It is necessary to make people truly realize and bear in mind that citizens' failure to perform their legal obligations, like administrative subjects' failure to perform their legal duties, is an infringement of public interests and the legitimate rights and interests of others; illegal or improper private acts should be punished and corrected in accordance with the law.", "minor_premise": " paragraph?", "conclusion": "Illegal or improper exercise of power should be sanctioned and correcte"}

{"label": "entailed", "major_premise": "Dilemma reasoning is an inference consisting of two hypothetical judgments and a disjunctive judgment. Hypothetical judgment is the judgment that the existence of one thing (called antecedent) is the condition of the existence of another thing (called antecedent). A disjunctive judgment is a judgment that at least one of several possible scenarios exists. {"label": "entailed", "major_premise": "Zoologist: In the Lake Champlain area, as the North American snowshoe hare population grows", "conclusion": "Local weather patterns that can affect species' population changes can occur both in the presence of sunspot activity and in its absence.", "minor_premise": "do the populations of its predators. As predator numbers increase, the hares seek food in more heavily forested areas, which contain less food, and so the hare population declines. Predator populations thus decline, the hare population starts to increase, and the cycle begins again. Yet these facts alone cannot explain why populations of snowshoe hares everywhere behave simultaneously in this cyclical way. Since the hare population cycle is well correlated with the regular cycle of sunspot activity, that activity is probably a causal factor as well."}

{"label": "not entailed", "major_premise": "The reason why piezoelectric ceramics can generate electricity is that there is a permanent spontaneous polarization in each tiny grain of this kind of ceramics. Under the action of a strong external electric field, they will be arranged neatly along the direction of the electric field, making the whole crystal polar. They can induce electrical phenomena externally under the change of stress or temperature. The greater the external stress, the higher the change frequency, The higher the generating power is, the higher the energy conversion efficiency can be obtained at the resonance frequency. When a piezoelectric power supply with high voltage and low current is required, block piezoelectric ceramics can be selected; When a piezoelectric power supply with low voltage and high current is required, thin piezoelectric ceramic integration can be selected. At present, it is reported that various products have been used for various types of charging power supply. It is characterized by small volume, light weight and can be carried with you, especially in high mountain areas or desert areas without power supply. It can use all kinds of mechanical power to store power for power generation, free from the influence of magnetic field and nuclear radiation, and not aging.", "minor_premise": "Which of the following options does not match the paragraph:", "conclusion": "iezoelectric ceramic power supply can generate electricity by mechanical force without interference of external electric field"}

{"label": "entailed", "major_premise": "To determine whether the formation of a ring crater or ring structure is related to the impact of meteorites, the key is to find out whether the rock of the crater has been subjected to shock waves accompanied by a strong impact of meteorites. Under the action of a strong shock wave, the target rock will undergo shock metamorphism. Regarding the identification of meteorite impact craters, the international scientific community has clarified three diagnostic indicators of shock metamorphism: mineral smashing surface sheeting, mineral smashing glass, and smashing mineral high pressure Polymorphic transformation. In nature, except for the shock wave effect caused by the overspeed impact of extraterrestrial bodies, any other natural process or geological effect cannot trigger such mineral physical changes in the geological body. If one of the above three indicators can be found in the surface ring geological structure, it can be determined that a meteorite impact event has occurred in this area.", "minor_premise": " text, what about a ring pit or ring structure?", "conclusion": "The discovery of mineral shock glass can be judged to be formed by meteorite impact."}

{"label": "entailed", "major_premise": "The reason why piezoelectric ceramics can generate electricity is that there is a permanent spontaneous polarization in each tiny grain of this kind of ceramics. Under the action of a strong external electric field, they will be arranged neatly along the direction of the electric field, making the whole crystal polar. They can induce electrical phenomena externally under the change of stress or temperature. The greater the external stress, the higher the change frequency, The higher the generating power is, the higher the energy conversion efficiency can be obtained at the resonance frequency. When a piezoelectric power supply with high voltage and low current is required, block piezoelectric ceramics can be selected; When a piezoelectric power supply with low voltage and high current is required, thin piezoelectric ceramic integration can be selected. At present, it is reported that various products have been used for various types of charging power supply. It is characterized by small volume, light weight and can be carried with you, especially in high mountain areas or desert areas without power supply. It can use all kinds of mechanical power to store power for power generation, free from the influence of magnetic field and nuclear radiation, and not aging.", "minor_premise": "Which of the following options does not match the paragraph:", "conclusion": "The selected piezoelectric ceramics have different shapes and produce different current and voltage"}

{"label": "not entailed", "major_premise": "Font tower, also known as font, treasure tower, word incinerator, tribute pavilion and so on, as the name implies, is a tower-shaped building that burns character paper in ancient times. The ancients believed that writing was sacred and noble, and that written paper should not be discarded at will, even if the waste paper needed to be washed and incinerated. When burning words and paper, it is very solemn, not only with special personnel, but also with special etiquette. Villagers in some places also organize cherish associations. In addition to volunteering, people volunteer to take to the streets to collect words and paper. After all the used subsets of Confucian classics are worn and broken, they should be sacrificed in the font tower for ten or eight years, and then set on fire and incinerated after a memorial ceremony on an auspicious day. Although the etiquette was not inferior to the common people in the Western Zhou Dynasty, the original purpose of establishing the etiquette system was to safeguard the interests of the slave owners and aristocrats and strengthen the hierarchical system of the slave society so as to coordinate the internal relations among the slave owners. However, after entering the Spring and Autumn period, with the emergence of slavery, such as the collapse of etiquette and music, the downward movement of knowledge, and the lack of distinction between people, this tradition and etiquette system has thus penetrated into a wider range of social life, which has become a code of conduct and norms widely observed by the society.", "minor_premise": " the main description of the etiquette system?", "conclusion": "It is to protect the interests of slave owners and aristocrats."}

When people re-examine the plagiarism-prone reference through the ages according to this standard, it becomes clear that what kind of behavior should be condemned by public opinion. In the field of literary creation, for example, Shakespeare was trapped in plagiarism as early as the 17 th century, and many sentences in his works were the same as those of his predecessors. The vast majority of people acquiesced in Shakespeare's plagiarism and even unswervingly regarded Shakespeare as a great master in the literary world, because in his time, such reference was conducive to the dissemination of knowledge and benefit to the public. however, it does not cause material harm to the original author or is negligible.", "minor_premise": " opinion?", "conclusion": "In a certain era, plagiarism that actually infringes the original author will be condemned"}

{"label": "not entailed", "major_premise": "In the telecommunication network, each user must have a set of dynamic data to mark user attributes, tariff, etc. This set of data is stored in the local server. All construction costs of telecom network must be taken back from the tariff. If the roaming fee caused by unbalanced regional economic development is cancelled, all costs can only be shared equally among the whole network, that is, each user in the country, That is, users who do not need to roam should subsidize part of the fees for roaming users. {"label": "not entailed", "major_premise": "The wooden chairs effect means that two groups of students with equal grades are arranged to study on comfortable sofa chairs and very uncomfortable wooden chairs respectively. Soon, the academic performance of students sitting on wooden chairs is much higher than that of students sitting on sofa chairs. The reason is that students sitting on wooden chairs constantly adjust their sitting posture for discomfort, which seems to be restless and active on the surface, The essence therefore supplies more blood and nutrition to the brain. The learning effect of students sitting on sofa chairs is worse, because they are comfortable and motionless, resulting in a relative slowdown in blood circulation and a relative reduction in blood and nutrition for the brain.", "conclusion": "A student was punished since he was young, and his academic performance has been unsatisfactory.", "minor_premise": "According to the above definition, which of the following best reflects the wooden chair effect?"}

{"label": "not entailed", "major_premise": "The microscopic shape of lithium metal changes sharply during charge and discharge, which leads to the precipitation of lithium dendrite. Lithium dendrite will not only reduce the capacity of the battery, but also cause short circuit in the battery, fire and explosion and other safety accidents. If a layer of plasticine with a thickness of about 1 micron is coated on the surface of lithium metal, the lithium metal electrode can be protected almost perfectly. In the normal process of charge and discharge, lithium metal is uniformly deposited on the surface of the electrode and has little force on the plasticine. The soft plasticine can well adapt to the changes of the shape and volume of lithium metal, stick firmly to the surface of lithium and play the role of protective coating. Once lithium dendrites prick out in some areas, the plasticine coating will harden rapidly, thus effectively blocking the growth of lithium dendrites.", "minor_premise": " text?", "conclusion": "The history of lithium battery development"}

Now you put your finger away, for example, straighten your arm, and if you look at it last time, you will feel that your finger is moving relative to the background, but not so much. With the advent of the era of electric vehicles and smart grid, the large-scale development of lithium-ion battery is restricted by the bottleneck of lithium resource shortage. Compared with lithium, sodium has rich reserves, wide distribution, low cost, and similar physical and chemical properties to lithium. Therefore, the research of sodium ion battery has attracted extensive attention in scientific research and industry again. Compared with lithium-ion battery, sodium ion battery usually has low energy density. Although it is not suitable for the field of portable electronic equipment and electric vehicles with high demand for energy density, it is suitable for low-speed electric vehicles and communication base stations with low energy density and cost sensitivity, household energy storage and other fields.", "minor_premise": " passage?", "conclusion": "The expensive cost of lithium-ion battery is the bottleneck of its development."}

The iron in seawater mainly comes from suspended matter in rivers. However, most of these suspended iron-containing substances are deposited in offshore areas. The purpose of this is to determine the central position of the typhoon more accurately, and to drop the falling falling instrument in the eye of the typhoon, which can measure the temperature, humidity and air pressure at all heights in the eye of the typhoon. {"label": "entailed", "major_premise": "By analyzing the light released or absorbed by the atoms of an object, we can measure whether the object is far away from the earth or close to the earth. when the object is far away from the earth, the frequency of these light will shift to the red end of the spectrum (low frequency), referred to as redshift, on the contrary, it is called blue shift. This unique light emitted by atoms is also affected by the mass of the elementary particles that make up the atoms, especially electrons. If the mass of an atom increases, the energy of the photons released by it will also become higher", "conclusion": "From the perspective of other celestial bodies in the universe, redshift is also an absolutely dominant phenomenon", "minor_premise": "the frequency of release and absorption will be blue-shifted. On the contrary, if the particles become lighter and lighter, the frequency will redshift. Astronomical observations have found that most galaxies have redshift, and the farther away the galaxies are from Earth, the greater the redshift. Based on this, many scientists believe that the universe must be expanding."}

{"label": "not entailed", "major_premise": "Here are the introduction of the wooden chair effect. Two groups of students with equal grades are arranged to sit on comfortable sofa chairs and very uncomfortable wooden chairs to study. After a while, the academic performance of the students sitting on the wooden chairs is much higher than that of the students sitting on the sofa chairs. The reason is that students sitting on wooden chairs constantly adjust their sitting posture because they are uncomfortable. On the face of it, they seem to be restless, but in fact, they supply more blood and nutrition to their brains; while students sitting on sofa chairs keep still because of comfort, resulting in a relatively slow down of blood circulation, and relatively less blood and nutrients to their brains, so their learning effect becomes worse.", "conclusion": "A month after moving into the new study room, Xiao Ming's grades and ranking rose greatly.", "minor_premise": "According to the above definition, which one of the following options best reflects the wooden chair effect?"}

{"label": "not entailed", "major_premise": "As the environmental public interest litigation is aimed at many individuals, the polluter and the same player have higher transaction costs, in the case of the previous lack of environmental public interest litigation channels, it is very difficult for the polluted party to obtain compensation under the condition of high transaction cost, that is, it is impossible to form a cooperative game between the two parties. In the new legal environment, the possible changes are. Taking into account the possibility of public interest litigation, the polluters take a more cooperative stand. In this regard, around environmental issues, the two sides are more likely to reach a cooperative game, that is, the polluters distribute part of the pollution benefits to the polluted parties.
